Containers.Description: Madsonic is a full replacement for your current Subsonic server!, Madsonic is designed for people who want more from the vanilla Subsonic features.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where madsonic will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/media[/b] This is where madsonic will scan for media files.[br][br] [b]Note[/b] If you wish to use HTTP then please set the Environment Variable "SSL" to "no", otherwise set to "yes" to enable HTTPS.
